## PackageManager.unpackWithType() method

unpacks an envelope with a known media type

**Signature:**

```typescript
unpackWithType(mediaType: MediaType, envelope: Uint8Array): Promise<BasicMessage>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mediaType | [MediaType](./js-sdk.protocol_constants.mediatype.md) |  |
|  envelope | Uint8Array |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[BasicMessage](./js-sdk.basicmessage.md)&gt;

`Promise<BasicMessage>`
